name: pf2etools
author: Pf2eTools
description: A site dedicated to making playing games with your friends as easy as possible.

scripts.test: npm run test:js && npm run test:styles && npm run test:data
scripts.build: npm run clean-jsons && npm run gen-all && npm run build:css && npm run build:schema && npm run build:sw:prod
scripts.build-no-sw: npm run build && del-cli sw.js && del-cli sw-injector.js
scripts.build:css: npm run build:css:main && npm run build:css:classes && npm run build:css:misc && npm run build:css:search
scripts.build:css:main: npx sass --source-map --style=compressed scss/main.scss css/style.css && npx postcss ./css/style.css --use autoprefixer -r
scripts.build:css:classes: npx sass --source-map --style=compressed scss/classes.scss css/classes.css && npx postcss ./css/classes.css --use autoprefixer -r
scripts.build:css:search: npx sass --source-map --style=compressed scss/search.scss css/search.css && npx postcss ./css/search.css --use autoprefixer -r
scripts.build:css:misc: npx sass --source-map --style=compressed scss/list-page--grouped.scss css/list-page--grouped.css && npx postcss ./css/list-page--grouped.css --use autoprefixer -r
scripts.build:schema: npm run build:schema:traits && npm run build:schema:languages && npm run build:schema:sources
scripts.preversion: npm run test:js && npm run test:data
